meaningMnemonic: The <radical>turtle shell</radical> radical and the <kanji>turtle shell</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Oddly, this can also be used to talk about the first item in a list, so to mean <kanji>A</kanji> out of A through D, for example.
readingMnemonic: With a <kanji>turtle shell</kanji> on his back, imagine <reading>こう</reading>いち.
